properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Wherefore Thou high heaven didst spurn? Wherefore Thou to earth didst turn? Why leave heav’n to come to earth Lonely, scorned, e’en suffering death?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou in heav’n—the glorious One! Thou on earth—the outcast Man! Though this suffering Thou didst know, Love would come to bear our woe.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yet we hope the day to see When from every hindrance free, When to Thee, in glory, brought, We shall serve Thee as we ought.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now, O Lord, we wait for Thee, Wait “the blessed hope” to see. May we ever for Thee live, Till Thy saints Thou dost receive.{/lang-eng}
